content.en: Image Reconstruction: Researchers have been exploring various algorithms to improve the quality of reconstructed images in photoacoustic imaging. These algorithms, such as total-variation-minimization enhanced iterative reconstruction and forward-backward splitting method, aim to enhance the reconstruction process and address challenges like limited-angle data and sparse-view imaging. By attributing agency to these algorithms, scientists hope to find more efficient and accurate ways to reconstruct images in photoacoustic tomography.
content.da: Billedgengivelse: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre kvaliteten af rekonstruerede billeder i fotoakustisk billeddannelse. Disse algoritmer, såsom total-variation-minimering forbedret iterativ rekonstruktion og forward-backward splitting metode, sigter mod at forbedre rekonstruktionsprocessen og tackle udfordringer som begrænsede vinkeldata og sparse-view billeddannelse. Ved at tilskrive disse algoritmer agens håber forskerne at finde mere effektive og nøjagtige måder at rekonstruere billeder i fotoakustisk tomografi.
